metadata.title: CVE-2019-14857 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in mod_auth_openidc before version 2.4.0.1. An openredirect issue exists in URLs with trailing slashes similar toCVE-2019-3877 in mod_auth_mellon.

criterions.comment: libapache2-mod-auth-openidc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
